verses.verse: <S%G2455>Jude,<s%> a bond-servant of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James,<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are the <S%G2822>called,<s%> <S%G25>beloved<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and <S%G5083>kept<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>
May <S%G1656>mercy<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> and <S%G26>love<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> to you.

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> while I was <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4710>effort<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> you <S%G4012>about<s%> our <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> I <S%G2192>felt<s%> the <S%G318>necessity<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> to you <S%G3870>appealing<s%> that you <S%G1864>contend<s%> <S%G1864>earnestly<s%> for the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which was <S%G530>once<s%> for <S%G530>all<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

For <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>persons<s%> have <S%G3921>crept<s%> in <S%G3921>unnoticed,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G3819>long<s%> <S%G4270>beforehand<s%> <S%G4270>marked<s%> out for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation,<s%> <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G765>persons<s%> who <S%G3346>turn<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2316>God<s%> into <S%G766>licentiousness<s%> and <S%G720>deny<s%> our <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1203>Master<s%> and <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G1014>desire<s%> to <S%G5279>remind<s%> you, though you <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> for <S%G530>all,<s%> that the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> after <S%G4982>saving<s%> a <S%G2992>people<s%> out of the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G1208>subsequently<s%> <S%G622>destroyed<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who did not <S%G4100>believe.<s%>

And <S%G32>angels<s%> who did not <S%G5083>keep<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G746>domain,<s%> but <S%G620>abandoned<s%> their <S%G2398>proper<s%> <S%G3613>abode,<s%> He has <S%G5083>kept<s%> in <S%G126>eternal<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G2217>darkness<s%> for the <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

<S%G5613>Just<s%> as <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> and <S%G1116>Gomorrah<s%> and the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> them, since they in the <S%G3664>same<s%> <S%G5158>way<s%> as <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1608>indulged<s%> in <S%G1608>gross<s%> <S%G1608>immorality<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G2087>strange<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> are <S%G4295>exhibited<s%> as an <S%G1164>example,<s%> in <S%G5254>undergoing<s%> the <S%G1349>punishment<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

<S%G3305>Yet<s%> in the <S%G3668>same<s%> <S%G3668>manner<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>men,<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> by <S%G1797>dreaming,<s%> <S%G3392>defile<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and <S%G114>reject<s%> <S%G2963>authority,<s%> and <S%G987>revile<s%> angelic <S%G1391>majesties.<s%>

But <S%G3413>Michael<s%> the <S%G743>archangel,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he <S%G1252>disputed<s%> with the <S%G1228>devil<s%> and <S%G1256>argued<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> did not <S%G5111>dare<s%> <S%G2018>pronounce<s%> <S%G2018>against<s%> him a <S%G988>railing<s%> <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> but <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> you."

But <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>men<s%> <S%G987>revile<s%> the things <S%G3745>which<s%> they do not <S%G3609>understand;<s%> and the things <S%G3745>which<s%> they <S%G1987>know<s%> by <S%G5447>instinct,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G249>unreasoning<s%> <S%G2226>animals,<s%> by <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> they are <S%G5351>destroyed.<s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to them! For they have <S%G4198>gone<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2535>Cain,<s%> and for <S%G3408>pay<s%> they have <S%G7062>rushed<s%> <S%G7062>headlong<s%> into the <S%G4106>error<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam,<s%> and <S%G622>perished<s%> in the <S%G485>rebellion<s%> of <S%G2879>Korah.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>men<s%> are <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G4694>hidden<s%> <S%G4694>reefs<s%> in your <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G26>feasts<s%> when they <S%G4910>feast<s%> with you <S%G870>without<s%> <S%G870>fear,<s%> <S%G4165>caring<s%> for <S%G1438>themselves;<s%> <S%G3507>clouds<s%> <S%G504>without<s%> <S%G504>water,<s%> <S%G3911>carried<s%> <S%G3911>along<s%> by <S%G417>winds;<s%> <S%G5352>autumn<s%> <S%G1186>trees<s%> <S%G175>without<s%> <S%G175>fruit,<s%> <S%G1364>doubly<s%> <S%G599>dead,<s%> <S%G1610>uprooted;<s%>

<S%G66>wild<s%> <S%G2949>waves<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G1890>casting<s%> up their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G152>shame<s%> <S%G1890>like<s%> <S%G1890>foam;<s%> <S%G4107>wandering<s%> <S%G792>stars,<s%> for <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2217>black<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> has been <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%>

And about <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1802>Enoch,<s%> [in] the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> [generation] from <S%G76>Adam,<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> with <S%G3461>many<s%> <S%G3461>thousands<s%> of His <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G40>ones,<s%>

to <S%G4160>execute<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> upon <S%G3956>all,<s%> and to <S%G1651>convict<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G765>ungodly<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G763>ungodly<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G764>done<s%> in an <S%G764>ungodly<s%> <S%G764>way,<s%> and of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4642>harsh<s%> <S%G4642>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G763>ungodly<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> Him. "

<S%G3778>These<s%> are <S%G1113>grumblers,<s%> <S%G3202>finding<s%> <S%G3202>fault,<s%> <S%G4198>following<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their [own] <S%G1939>lusts;<s%> they <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G5246>arrogantly,<s%> <S%G2296>flattering<s%> <S%G4383>people<s%> for the <S%G5484>sake<s%> of [gaining an] <S%G5622>advantage.<s%>

But you, <S%G27>beloved,<s%> ought to <S%G3403>remember<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> that were <S%G4275>spoken<s%> <S%G4275>beforehand<s%> by the <S%G652>apostles<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

that they were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to you, "In the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> there shall be <S%G1703>mockers,<s%> <S%G4198>following<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G763>ungodly<s%> <S%G1939>lusts.<s%>"
<S%G3778>These<s%> are the ones who <S%G592>cause<s%> <S%G592>divisions,<s%> worldly-minded, <S%G3361>devoid<s%> <S%G2192><s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

But you, <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G2026>building<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> up on your <S%G40>most<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4102>faith;<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%>

<S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> in the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4327>waiting<s%> <S%G4327>anxiously<s%> for the <S%G1656>mercy<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
And <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3739>some,<s%> <S%G3303><s%> who are <S%G1252>doubting;<s%>

<S%G4982>save<s%> others, <S%G726>snatching<s%> them out of the <S%G4442>fire;<s%> and on <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> with <S%G5401>fear,<s%> <S%G3404>hating<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G5509>garment<s%> <S%G4695>polluted<s%> by the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to Him who is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5442>keep<s%> you from <S%G679>stumbling,<s%> and to <S%G2476>make<s%> you <S%G2476>stand<s%> in the <S%G2714>presence<s%> of His <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G299>blameless<s%> with <S%G20>great<s%> <S%G20>joy,<s%>

to the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> [be] <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G3172>majesty,<s%> <S%G2904>dominion<s%> and <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G165>time<s%> and <S%G3568>now<s%> and <S%G165>forever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
